name: Escape From Station 44
description:
Epic Mega Jam solo entry...

Title: Escape From Station 44

Team Name: Gooner44

Developer: Tarl Raney

Content used - Polygon Sci-Fi Space pack from Synty Studios, Icons from Rexard, Random sounds from various locations. All gameplay is original for the jam.

Controller required. Move and look with sticks. Jetpack with A, X to interact, Left Trigger to activate Magnetic Boots when near ground, follow prompts as they appear.

You wake up from cryo sleep to find the station without air. Act fast or die.
